p: Loratadine (BP), sulpiride (BP), Olive oil (highly refined), Sodium deoxycholate, Soya bean phsphatidylecholine (EP), Ovalbumin (Grade V) and cellulose membrane (molecular weight cutoff 12000– 14000) were bought from Sigma–Aldrich Chemical Co. (Poole, UK). Tween 80 (chemically pure), Al (OH) 3 and Glycerol were obtained from Fisher Chemical (Loughborough, UK). Other chemicals and reagents were of analytical grade and purchased from El-Nasr Pharmaceutical Company (Cairo, Egypt).
